page.title: 20BONAR BRIDGE SCHOOL
page.content: Our{school}is a primary with 60 pupils in 3 classes. On three days a week there is also a{nursery}with 27 pupils. On one morning a week there is a{playgroup}for under 4 year olds. The school used to be a junior secondary and so has good facilities with{five {classrooms, a nursery, gym and {canteen.}There are visiting teachers of{P.E., music, art and sewing.}A {chanter instructor}also visits once a week. The Head Teacher lives in the Schoolhouse which is attached to the Canteen and Tordale Annexe.{Tordale {Annexe}is a special unit for handicapped pupils. At the moment there are four pupils in it. All the information and data for this project was written and compiled by the{P.5, 6 and 7 pupils of Bonar {Bridge Primary School.
